name: Jan's Chipotle Roasted Sweet Potatoes
author: What's for dinner, mom?
summary: Quick and easy way to jazz-up sweet potatoes. Great blend of sweet, salty, spicy, and a flash of heat. Great with pork roast, ribs, ham, or your favorite BBQ.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons brown sugar, or more to taste
1 tablespoon chipotle chile powder, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Toss sweet potatoes and butter together in a large bowl
Whisk brown sugar, onion powder, garlic powder, chipotle chile powder, salt, and black pepper together in a small bowl; sprinkle over sweet potatoes and toss to coat
Pour potatoes in a single layer onto the prepared baking sheet
Roast in the preheated oven until potatoes are tender, 30 to 45 minutes
